name: Project - Totally not Double Dragon
description:
Esmé - concept art, 2D environment art and UI design

Solomon - Sounds (coming soon), Production

Rob - 3D Art, Shader Production, Material creation, VFX, Lighting, World Building, Gameplay programming... Literally everything in the game except the background

Player Sprite is taken from here: SNES - Super Double Dragon - Billy Lee - The Spriters Resource (spriters-resource.com)

Enemy Sprite is taken from here: SNES - Super Double Dragon - Jackson - The Spriters Resource (spriters-resource.com)

I apologies to any fans of double dragon who may be offended by this, But I think it's pretty good!

Difficulty is set to super easy so we can get feedback on critical game functions, let us know how you get on we won't get offended!

Everything else is origional work.
